availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Sanders (Gallatin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eleanor Hexon Sanders in Gallatin County, Kentucky, on November 25, 1845. Father of George G. Sanders, Lewis Sanders, Ann R. Sanders, Nathaniel Sanders, Charles Sanders, and John C. Sanders. Owned two enslaved persons in Gallatin County in 1840. Farmer in Gallatin County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Gallatin County in 1860. Assigned arms by the Kentucky Military Board .

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin, p. 20.
